original_text: One of them went out into the fields to gather herbs and found a wild vine and picked as many of its gourds as his garment could hold. When he returned, he cut them up into the pot of stew, though no one knew what they were.
korean_text: 한 사람이 채소를 캐러 들에 나가 들포도덩굴을 만나 그것에서 들호박을 따서 옷자락에 채워가지고 돌아와 썰어 국 끓이는 솥에 넣되 그들은 무엇인지 알지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: One of them went out into the fields
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람이 밭으로 나가서

sentences.original_text: and picked as many of its gourds
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 덩굴의 열매를 많이 따서
그의 옷에 담을 만큼 가득 담았다

sentences.original_text: he cut them up into the pot of stew
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들을 스튜 냄비에 잘라 넣었다

sentences.original_text: though no one knew what they were
